title: Marissa Mathy-Zvaifler // 133
description:
In 2003, a 16-year-old girl attended a concert in Albuquerque with her best friends expecting to have a fantastic night with their favorite artist. But after looking for help from a foot injury during the show, she seemingly vanished out of thin air. Days later, a devastating phone call came in to police with a horrifying explanation. This is the story of Marissa Mathy-Zvaifler.
EDUCATING MARISSA documentary:
https://vimeo.com/242484018

patreon.com/goingwestpodcast
